summary.span: 表示 控制項中的資料行行首。

span.span: Represents a column header in a control.

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值而定的屬性控制項，這個方法會呼叫控制項的方法來擷取剪貼簿格式的值，表示儲存格。Depending on the value of the property of the control, this method is called by the control's method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell. 位置相關的參數，這個方法可讓您指出此資料格代表在所選儲存格所定義之區域的資料的資料表中的所在位置控制項。The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the control. 根據儲存格的位置，格式設定資訊可能會傳回由這個方法除了儲存格的值。Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value. 比方說，資料列的第一個資料行中的資料格的 HTML 格式將會包含表示資料列開頭的標記。For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row. 支援的剪貼簿格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

span.span: is not -1.
